title: Celebrating A Year Of Big Breaks
teaser: The Weekends on All Things Considered series "My Big Break" is turning a year old this weekend. NPR's Arun Rath talks with producer Daniel Hajek about his experience making the series.
contentencoded:
The Weekends on All Things Considered series "My Big Break" is turning a year old this weekend. NPR's Arun Rath talks with producer Daniel Hajek about his experience making the series, and they revisit the first Big Break that aired â€” the story of Bill O'Leary, which you can read below.
